Service Details: - Provides safe and affordable housing for all households (native and non-native people) of low and moderate income in Kelowna and in the Central Okanagan region- Acquires land and existing housing- Constructs, rebuilds and restores housing- Manages, repairs and maintains property and housing -Rents, leases, sells and mortgages property and housing- Assists natives and non-natives in obtaining and acquiring safe and affordable housing
Eligibility: Nissen Crossing - non-subsidized rents and open to everyone; Gerstmar and Ingram complexes - subsidized for Aboriginal families with dependent children.
How to Apply: Please call, email or visit the website
Address & Map: 1855 Kirschner Rd, #240Kelowna, BC     V1Y 4N7View MapQuest Map
